TopicTitle: Flight control feedback indicator is sorely missing

Articles.Content: This flight control feedback indicator showed how much control input was being commanded in any direction at a glance.  This is good to see how hard the SAS is working to keep the craft stable.  As it is, I have to watch manually for control surface deflection and this is a dangerous distraction during ascent.
I think the little green arrows around the navball do this
Thanks you are totally right.  I actually noticed it not long after I made this post.  Looking at it now I am not sure how I missed it.
